A.name: N
A.caption: N
A.formula: select coalesce( max(SPCNUMB)::int+1,1) from @TABLENAME where BUDGETLISTID=@BUDGETLISTID ::bigint and cid=0

A.name: Имя файла
A.caption: Имя файла
A.formula: select f.filename from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID ::bigint

A.name: Размер файла
A.caption: Размер файла
A.formula: select f.size from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID ::bigint

A.name: Дата создания файла
A.caption: Дата создания файла
A.formula: select f.docdate from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID ::bigint

A.name: Настройки фильтра
A.formula: case when @FILTER = 'false' then null else (select b.filterinfo from configcolumnsbuff b where b.id = @ID ::bigint) end

A.name: Тип
A.caption: Тип
A.formula: select u.classnode from units u where u.id = @UNITID::bigint

A.name: Сумма
A.caption: Сумма
A.formula: select coalesce(sum(bls.SUMM),0) from BUDGETLISTSPC bls where bls.BudgetListId = @ID ::bigint

A.name: Исполнено
A.caption: Исполнено
A.formula: select coalesce(sum(pp.summ),0) from POSTPAY pp, BUDGETLISTSPC bls where pp.BudgetListSpcId = bls.ID and bls.BudgetListId = @ID ::bigint

A.name: Остаток
A.caption: Остаток
A.formula: select sum( coalesce(bls.SUMM,0) - coalesce(pp.summ,0) ) from BudgetListSpc bls left join PostPay pp on pp.BudgetListSpcId = bls.ID where bls.BudgetListId = @ID ::bigint

A.name: Код КБК дохода
A.caption: Код КБК дохода
A.formula: select p_get_kbk_code (@KBKINID ::bigint)

A.name: Исполнено
A.caption: Исполнено
A.formula: select coalesce(sum(pp.summ),0) as SummExec from PostPay pp where pp.BudgetListSpcId = @ID ::bigint

A.name: Остаток
A.caption: Остаток
A.formula: select @SUMM ::bigint - (select coalesce(sum(pp.summ),0) from PostPay pp where pp.BudgetListSpcId = @ID ::bigint)

A.name: Разнесено
A.caption: Разнесено
A.formula: select coalesce(sum( pp.summ ),0) from PostPay pp where pp.PayListId = @ID ::bigint

A.name: Остаток
A.caption: Остаток
A.formula: select pl.summ - ( select coalesce(sum( pp.summ ),0) from PostPay pp where pp.PayListId = pl.id ) as srp from PayList pl where pl.id = @ID ::bigint

A.name: КБК
A.caption: КБК
A.formula: select 'N:'||to_char(bls.SPCNUMB,'999999999')|| ' Бюджет: '|| bl.BudgetName|| ' от '||bl.docdate ||' '||a.code||' КБК:'|| COALESCE( k1.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE( k4.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE( k5.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE( k7.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE( k9.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k12.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k14.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k18.CODE ,'.')||' '||f.name from BudgetListSpc bls, BudgetList bl, Agent a, KbkIn f LEFT JOIN DIRRECIP k1 on f.Kbk10In = k1.id LEFT JOIN Kbk20In k4 on f.Kbk20In = k4.id LEFT JOIN Kbk30In k5 on f.Kbk30In = k5.id LEFT JOIN Kbk40In k7 on f.Kbk40In = k7.id LEFT JOIN Kbk50In k9 on f.Kbk50In = k9.id LEFT JOIN Kbk60In k12 on f.Kbk60In = k12.id LEFT JOIN Kbk70In k14 on f.Kbk70In = k14.id LEFT JOIN Kbk80In k18 on f.Kbk80In = k18.id where bl.id=bls.BudgetListId and bl.resipiendid =a.id and f.id = bls.KbkInId and bls.id= @BUDGETLISTSPCID ::bigint

A.name: Код КБК дохода
A.caption: Код КБК дохода
A.formula: select COALESCE(k1.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k4.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k5.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k7.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k9.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k12.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k14.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k18.CODE,'.') from KbkIn kin LEFT JOIN DIRRECIP k1 on kin.KBK10IN = k1.id LEFT JOIN KBK20IN k4 on kin.KBK20IN = k4.id LEFT JOIN KBK30IN k5 on kin.KBK30IN = k5.id LEFT JOIN KBK40IN k7 on kin.KBK40IN = k7.id LEFT JOIN KBK50IN k9 on kin.KBK50IN = k9.id LEFT JOIN KBK60IN k12 on kin.KBK60IN = k12.id LEFT JOIN KBK70IN k14 on kin.KBK70IN = k14.id LEFT JOIN KBK80IN k18 on kin.KBK80IN = k18.id where kin.id =@ID ::bigint

A.name: Код КБК расходов
A.caption: Код КБК расходов
A.formula: select COALESCE(k1.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k4.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k6.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k8.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k13.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k18.CODE,'.')|| COALESCE(k21.CODE,'.')||' '|| COALESCE(k24.CODE,'.')||' '|| COALESCE(k35.CODE,'.') from KBKOUT kout LEFT JOIN DIRRECIP k1 on kout.KBK10OUT = k1.id LEFT JOIN KBK20OUT k4 on kout.KBK20IN = k4.id LEFT JOIN KBK30OUT k6 on kout.KBK30IN = k6.id LEFT JOIN KBK40OUT k8 on kout.KBK40IN = k8.id LEFT JOIN KBK50OUT k13 on kout.KBK50IN = k13.id LEFT JOIN KBK60OUT k18 on kout.KBK60IN = k18.id LEFT JOIN ECONCLASS k21 on kout.ECONCLASS = k21.id LEFT JOIN BUDGALTCLASS k24 on kout.BUDGALTCLASS = k24.id LEFT JOIN BUDGFNDKIND k35 on kout.BUDGFNDKIND = k35.id where kout.id =@ID ::bigint

A.caption: На дату
A.formula: select now() ::date

A.name: Код КБК дохода
A.caption: Код КБК дохода
A.formula: select p_get_kbk_code(@KBKIN ::bigint)

A.caption: На дату
A.formula: select now() ::date
